title: 'Tories sinking feeling as 58 MPs announce plans to abandon Conservative ship'

title: Sunak warned against ‘playing footsie’ with Farage and Reform UK
description: Rishi Sunak has been warned against “playing footsie” with Reform UK following two bruising by-election defeats. The Prime Minister has been urged by some in his party to shift further to the right to see off the threat of the Nigel Farage-linked party.

title: EU, UK announce joint effort on migration
description: The EU and the U.K. have completed talks ahead of a new blueprint to crack down on illegal migration. The two parties will release details of the new cooperation agreement, which has been in the works since at least the fall, in the coming days.

title: Rishi Sunak defended after by-election defeats set against ‘difficult backdrop’
description: A Conservative minister has defended Rishi Sunak and the party after two by-election defeats, saying they were set against a “very difficult backdrop”. The losses to Labour in Wellingborough and Kingswood, as well as increased support for the emboldened Reform UK party, were the latest blow to the Prime Minister.

title: The new UK bridge that's two miles long and costs £1.6billion to build
description: The world's longest railway viaduct is being built as part of HS2 Phase One, which will connect London and Birmingham. It is costing around £1.6bn and is more than halfway complete

title: Tory Party under Boris Johnson could regain votes of ‘lost Conservatives’
description: Among the “lost Conservatives”, who said they won’t vote Tory at the next election but don’t know who to vote for, 52 per cent said they would vote for Mr Johnson over Sir Keir. This is compared to 39 per cent saying they would vote for the current Prime Minister over the Labour leader.
